main.name: Kambui Jiu Jitsu
main.description: Helping troubled and homeless youth through Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu
main.bio: Kamau Curnal is a Brazilian Jiu Jitsu black belt under Brian Johnson, a fourth-degree black belt under Rigan Machado.  He started jiu-jitsu in 2010 at over 360lbs, and was a felon and an addict in his past.  Now, he is a graduate of the 48 curriculum and has taught classes at Northwest Jiu-Jitsu Academy, Alpha Martial Arts, and his own Academy, Kambui Jiu Jitsu Academy.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: Kamau started at NWJJA in 2010, and earned his black belt from Brian Johnson on November 12, 2019
Owner and head instructor of Kambui Jiu Jitsu Academy, est. 2018
